SEARCH
Module com.example.milionerzy
Package com.example.milionerzy

Class Question

java.lang.Object
com.example.milionerzy.Question
public class Question extends Object
The `Question` class represents the controller for the question screen in the Milionerzy (Who Wants to Be a Millionaire) application. It handles the display of questions, user responses, and the use of lifelines (hints). It also manages the transition to the next question or the ending screen.
